string.text: Knife Master
Damage from quick knife attacks is significantly increased.
The arme blanche has always attracted you; its even, metallic gloss has a calming effect. Firearms are a convenient option, of course, but with a knife in your hand, you feel complete.
You have unlocked the Knife Master achievement.
Mechanic
High skill of independent repairing.
description st_perk_mech_descr
You have unlocked the Mechanic achievement.
Craftsman
Number of items available for crafting increased.

As a child, you assembled a radio from old parts in your father’s toolbox. In your youth, you repaired your motorcycle with spare parts from a flea market. Now, you feel that you will find some use in the technical debris lying in the Exclusion Zone.
You have unlocked the Craftsman achievement.
Butcher
You extract items from your prey more rapidly and effectively with your knife.

Your presence instils fear into the creatures of the Zone; to little surprise, because you are the last thing they see in their life in the vast majority of cases. Having learned how to deal with carcass of a mutant after an encounter, people begin to fear you.
You have unlocked the Butcher achievement.
Strong Stomach
Less damage when consuming harmful food.
Tasty, high-quality food in the Zone is a rarity, but you are able to consume and digest what any other person in their right mind wouldn’t even consider having a bite of.
You have unlocked the Strong Stomach achievement.
Lead Backpack
Reduced radiation from artifacts in your backpack.

The gifts of the Zone are alluring but extremely dangerous. Not so long ago, you acquired a special backpack, which should be able to neutralize some of their radiation. The time has come to put it to use.
You have unlocked the Lead Backpack achievement.
Attentive
Higher chance of finding additional items in stashes.

You have learned to notice the most insignificant details not only in the behavior of people, but also in the surrounding environment. During searches, not a single kopeck, bolt, or person manages hides from you…
You have unlocked the Attentive achievement.
Geologist
Higher chance of finding artifacts.
Humming, hissing, spitting; no types of anomalies are capable of intimidating you any longer, and your urge for exploration encourages you to travel to areas filled with them.
You have unlocked the Geologist achievement.
Authority
Number of companions increased, interrogations are more effective, reputation is gained faster, additional opportunities in dialogues.

Whether through charm, a natural ability to socialize, or perhaps a subtle knowledge of human psychology; it does not matter. You easily win the hearts of any person, whether it be a greedy huckster or an outspoken psychopath.
You have unlocked the Authority achievement.
Steady Hands
Recoil of small arms is significantly reduced.

In whatever condition you find yourself in, whether it be in emotional shock, a wild hangover, or a small earthquake while traveling on public transport, your hand never falters. The grip on your weapon is strong enough to leave dents on the handguard and stock.
You have unlocked the Steady Hands achievement.
